author: rivenbark
title: ADAcafé - Community Spaces
description: It's extremely difficult for a new person or group to learn and begin participating in Cardano without trusted guidance and knowledge.
solution: Provide financial, technical, & strategic resources to 10 Twitter Spaces, who connect & educate 1000s of people each week about Cardano.
experience:
We're already doing the Spaces. :) 
We're a global group with diverse skills, interest, languages, and expertise - personal & professional.
